name: Matilde Marcolli
content: Matilde Marcolli Matilde Marcolli Important Announcement Unfortunately, due to the completely unmanageable volume of requests, I have to make a drastic decision on this matter. For the time being: I DON'T GO TO CONFERENCES, I DON'T GIVE TALKS! Current exeptions: Linguistics conferences: I am still available for those Previously accepted engagements All other conference/lectures/seminars engagements are suspended indefinitely Something about myself "A drifter of Dadaist persuasion" (computational linguist, sometime physicist and occasional mathematician) Current Positions: Robert F. Christy Professor of Mathematics and Computing and Mathematical Sciences Department of Mathematics , Division of Physics, Mathematics, and Astronomy (PMA) Department of Computing and Mathematical Sciences, Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences (EAS) California Institute of Technology (Caltech) Address: Mathematics Department, Mail Code 253-37, Caltech, 1200 E.California Blvd. Pasadena, CA 91125, USA Email: matilde at caltech edu Office Phone: x-4326 Office: 262 Linde Hall of Mathematics and Physics History: Ph.D. 1997, University of Chicago. Advisor Melvin Rothenberg, UChicago Math Department (1997-2000): C.L.E.
